channel.title: Help with Equipping Items
channel.description: Im using Zombie-Scape Source, and when i put the item i wish to wield into client8.java client side and item.java source side, nothing happens when i click the item. I know im supposed to add somewhere to fix the wielding option but i cant figure it out. Any help appreciated.

item.title: Help with Equipping Items
item.dc:creator: @JvSwift JvSwift
item.description:
@JvSwift wrote:

i thought that was only for customs? its works for non-equipping items also? mk thx ill try it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Equipping Items
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Go to your source/server files and find the item.java once your in the item.java when you scroll down you will find things like “public static int boots” iff you have a pair of boots you want to wear on your feet in game and they are equipping somewhere else on your body add the item id after "public static int boots.

And do the same for every other item just scroll down untill you find stuff like.

“public static int platebody” etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Equipping Items
item.dc:creator: @JvSwift JvSwift
item.description:
@JvSwift wrote:

Im using Zombie-Scape Source, and when i put the item i wish to wield into client8.java client side and item.java source side, nothing happens when i click the item. I know im supposed to add somewhere to fix the wielding option but i cant figure it out. Any help appreciated.
